name: 國際性非營利組織人力資源專題研究
description: Understand human resource issues in non-profit oriented organizations in global context. Conduct study about human resource issues in International nonprofit organizations. Gain knowledge about human resource challenges in International nonprofit sectors. Understand strategies for studying and managing human resource issues in international nonprofit sectors.
goals: Understand human resource issues in non-profit oriented organizations in global context.
Conduct study about human resource issues in International nonprofit organizations.
Gain knowledge about human resource challenges in International nonprofit sectors.
Understand strategies for studying and managing human resource issues in international nonprofit sectors.
syllabus:
1.  **【授課方式：****16+2****週】Course Schedule: 16+2 weeks**
2.  第17週，同學閱讀線上教材，並準備報告。17th week: Study online materials and prepare for the paper. 
3.  第18週，同學完成報告之撰寫並上傳。18th week: Finish the paper and upload to the system.  

This course uses a project-oriented approach and provides an introduction to the fundamental value questions about human resource practice in nonprofit sectors, also including educational, governmental, and non-governmental organizations.

Each student will conduct a research project (e.g. thesis, conference paper, or other publications) that involves human resource issues in nonprofit, educational, and governmental organizations. Students will receive instruction individually with regard to their research projects. Through the course readings, discussion, and project implementation, students will have the opportunity to learn how to study human resource issues in nonprofit, educational, governmental, and nongovernmental sectors.
